primaryText: The reducers are the ones that specify how the application state changes in response to actions
secondaryText: At the end of the day a reducer is just a function that receives two arguments the {PREVIOUS_STATE}, the {ACTION} and returns the {NEW_STATE}
features: The community made the convention that the reducer has a switch to select the action to execute
They never mutate the state they create a new one based in the last state
